snippet.title: Legend of Dragoon - Intro Video [PSX]
snippet.description:
The opening movie/cutscene for 'Legend of Dragoon'.   Testing out my PSX Emulation software, and thought it'd be great to share this.

Support game makers, even if you use Emulators to play old systems and own the games, and a system able to play them.
---
Fraps + Camtasia
---
Thanks to Windows 8 dev preview x64(& windows 7 pro x64) for enabling to by-pass/correct read errors that prevented me from retrieving my legal backup copies of my data.
